cards.text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first time you install a card each turn, the Corp loses 1[credit].
cards.title: Corporate "Grant"

cards.flavor: "Go away! I'm not here!"
cards.text: The first time you would take any number of tags or suffer any amount of net damage each turn, you may trash No One Home to force the Corp to "<trace>trace 0</trace> If unsuccessful, the Runner avoids any number of tags or prevents any amount of net damage."
cards.title: No One Home

cards.flavor: Ripples are all the prey sees before Gbahali swallows it whole.
cards.text: [trash]: Break the last subroutine on the encountered piece of ice.
cards.title: Gbahali

cards.text:
Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
Force the Corp to "<trace>trace 3</trace> If unsuccessful, reveal all cards in HQ. The Runner may choose up to 2 of the revealed cards. Shuffle those cards into R&D."
cards.title: White Hat

cards.text: +3[mu] Use the MU on Knobkierie only for virus programs. The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may place 1 virus counter on an installed virus program. Limit 1 console per player.
cards.title: Knobkierie

cards.flavor:
"I'm sorry, sir, we weren't expecting you! You look different than I remember..."
"Haircut."
cards.text: Name a card type. Expose a card in a remote server, then gain 5[credit] if the exposed card has the named card type.
cards.title: Falsified Credentials

cards.text:
Place 18[credit] from the bank on Rogue Trading when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Rogue Trading, trash it.
[click], [click]: Take 6[credit] from Rogue Trading and take 1 tag.
cards.title: Rogue Trading

cards.flavor: Speed gets you in, intuition gets you out.
cards.text:
Place 3 power counters on Nyashia when it is installed.
Whenever you access cards from R&D, you may remove 1 hosted power counter to access 1 additional card from R&D.
cards.title: Nyashia

cards.flavor:
"It 'ate' the vertex grid?! What does that even mean?"
- Nkiru Qiū, Asa Group sysop
cards.text:
Whenever you trash a Corp card, you may place 1 virus counter on Consume.
[click]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter, then remove all virus counters from Consume.
cards.title: Consume

cards.flavor: Twisting, writhing, ripping into all that it touches.
cards.text:
Install Trypano only on a piece of ice.
When Trypano has 5 or more virus counters on it, trash host ice.
When your turn begins, you may place 1 virus counter on Trypano.
cards.title: Trypano

cards.flavor: "What kind of maniac infects their own rig?!"
cards.text: Place 3 virus counters on an installed Runner card with no hosted virus counters.
cards.title: Contaminate

cards.text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, name asset, ice, operation or upgrade, then reveal 2 cards from HQ at random. Trash each revealed card that has the named type, then gain 4[credit] for each card trashed this way.
cards.title: Embezzle

cards.text: When you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2[credit] to have it gain barrier until the end of the encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. 2[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 3[credit]: +6 strength.
cards.title: Laamb

cards.flavor: "Could God create a stone so heavy, He could not lift it?"
cards.text: [trash]: Bypass a piece of ice you are currently encountering. Lose any remaining clicks.
cards.title: Logic Bomb

cards.flavor: "Jackpot!"
cards.text:
When your turn begins, you may place 1[credit] on Jackpot!.
Whenever an agenda is added to your score area, you may take any number of credits from Jackpot!. If you do, trash Jackpot!.
cards.title: Jackpot!

cards.flavor: Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Eat. Code. Sleep. Eat. Code. Code. Sleep. Code. Code. Code. Eat. Code. Code. Code. Code. Code. Code.
cards.text: [click], suffer 1 net damage: Gain 1[credit] and draw 2 cards. Use this ability only once per turn.
cards.title: Zer0

cards.text: Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1 virus counter on Musaazi. Virus counter from any installed card: Break sentry subroutine. Virus counter from any installed card: +1 strength.
cards.title: Musaazi

cards.flavor: Getting it up the stairs was enough for him to know that if he ever moved, it was staying.
cards.text: The first time you break all subroutines on the outermost piece of ice during a run each turn, you may remove Hippo from the game to trash that piece of ice.
cards.title: Hippo

cards.flavor: Her gallop, thunder; her blade, lightning.
cards.text: 2[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. The first time each turn an encounter ends in which you used Amina to break all subroutines on a piece of ice, the Corp loses 1[credit].
cards.title: Amina

cards.text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5[credit], then you may gain 1[credit] for each credit lost.
cards.title: Diversion of Funds

cards.flavor:
"You called me, sir?"
"Why does my PAD keep flashing 'Sensitive Information Transfer'?!"
"Hmm, that's strange. Mine only does that on Tuesdays."
cards.text:
The first time the Corp gains credits through a card ability each turn, you may gain 1[credit].
[click], 3[credit]: Trash PAD Tap. Only the Corp can use this ability.
cards.title: PAD Tap

cards.flavor: It was a deal, to be sure. She just didn't know for which party.
cards.text: [click], [trash], trash a card from your grip: Install a program, piece of hardware, or virtual resource from your heap, paying its install cost.
cards.title: Reclaim

cards.text: When you encounter a piece of ice, you may pay 2[credit] to have it gain code gate until the end of the encounter. Use this ability only once per turn. 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +4 strength.
cards.title: Engolo

cards.text:
The first time a successful run on a remote server ends each turn, you may place 1 power counter on Kasi String if you accessed cards and stole no agendas.
When Kasi String has 4 or more power counters on it, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
cards.title: Kasi String

cards.flavor: All roads lead to Rome.
cards.text: Make a run on Archives. If successful, after accessing Archives, access 1 card from HQ, then access the top card from R&D.
cards.title: Divide and Conquer

cards.flavor: "Worth it."
cards.text:
Trash your grip.
Gain 10[credit].
cards.title: Guinea Pig

cards.text: +1[mu] Once per turn, when you would play or install a card, you may trash 1 card from your grip to lower the play or install cost by 2. Limit 1 console per player.
cards.title: Patchwork

cards.flavor: Another man's treasure.
cards.text: The first time each turn a program or a piece of hardware is trashed (from any location), you may place 1 power counter on District 99. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Add a card that matches the faction of your identity from your heap to your grip.
cards.title: District 99

cards.flavor: "We have you surrounded! For real, this time."
cards.text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, gain 9[credit] and take 1 tag.
cards.title: Hot Pursuit

cards.text: +1[mu] The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1[credit] and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.
cards.title: Paragon

cards.flavor:
"With the rise of crypto, banking has become much more complicated. Financial crime has not only kept pace, but exploded exponentially."
-After the Flash: A History of the War-That-Wasn't
cards.text:
Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1[credit] from the bank on Bankroll.
[trash]: Take all credits from Bankroll.
cards.title: Bankroll

cards.flavor:
"Any piece of ice is really just a paywall."
-Liza Talking Thunder
cards.text: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Tycoon to break a subroutine ends, the Corp gains 2[credit]. 1[credit]: break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
cards.title: Tycoon

cards.flavor: A classy alibi.
cards.text: The first time you avoid or remove a tag each turn, you may install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 1.
cards.title: Thunder Art Gallery

cards.flavor: "If I can't kill it, I know who can."
cards.text:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Miss Bones when she is installed. When there are no credits left on Miss Bones, trash her.
Use these credits to trash installed cards.
cards.title: Miss Bones

cards.flavor: "Running is all methaphor, all symbols and plumbing into the depths of the psyche. Sometimes that means tentacles." -Akiko Nisei
cards.text: 2[credit]: Host Ika on a piece of ice. 1[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines on host sentry. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
cards.title: Ika

cards.flavor: The journey is its own reward.
cards.text:
Install Kyuban only on a piece of ice.
Gain 2[credit] whenever you pass host ice.
cards.title: Kyuban

cards.flavor:
"Breathe, girl. Breathe." Mike flickered into focus as she brushed Akiko's tears away. "What did you see?"
"I..." Akiko hesitated. "Everything."
cards.text: The first time a successful run on R&D ends each turn, you may gain 1[credit] for each card you accessed from R&D.
cards.title: Psych Mike

cards.text: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead of accessing cards, install up to 5 cards from your heap facedown. Remove Reboot from the game instead of trashing it.
cards.title: Reboot

cards.flavor: "So, Miriam, head anything good lately?"
cards.text:
Reduce the play cost of Office Supplies by 1 for each [link] you have.
Gain 4[credit] or draw 4 cards.
cards.title: Office Supplies

cards.text: Host a g-mod identity that does not match the faction of your identity on DJ Fenris when he is installed. Remove hosted identity from the game if DJ Fenris is uninstalled. DJ Fenris gains the text of the hosted identity. Limit 1 per deck.
cards.title: DJ Fenris

cards.flavor: <champion>Designed by 2017 European Champion Mike Sheehan</champion>
cards.text: Trash the top 3 cards of your stack, then shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove Labor Rights from the game instead of trashing it.
cards.title: Labor Rights

cards.flavor: <champion>Designed by 2017 GenCon Champion Sam Suied</champion>
cards.text:
Place 3[credit] from the bank on Crowdfunding when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Crowdfunding, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Crowdfunding.
When your turn ends, if you made at least 3 successful runs this turn, you may install Crowdfunding from your heap, ignoring all costs.
cards.title: Crowdfunding

cards.flavor: "If at first you don't succeed, boost its strength and try again." -g00ru
cards.text: 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
cards.title: Corroder

cards.text: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker. Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.
cards.title: Datasucker

cards.flavor: Something wicked this way comes.
cards.text: Place 2 virus counters on Imp when it is installed. Once per turn, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to trash a card you are accessing (even if it has no trash cost). Errata from CR 1.2
cards.title: Imp

cards.text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit].
Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.
cards.title: Lamprey

cards.flavor: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.
cards.text: 1[credit]: Break sentry subroutine.
cards.title: Mimic

cards.flavor: "Technology breeds crime."
cards.text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass a piece of code gate ice currently being encountered, even if it has strength greater than Abagnale.
cards.title: Abagnale

cards.flavor: "It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."
cards.text: 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. [trash]: Bypass a piece of barrier ice currently being encountered, even if it has strength greater than Demara.
cards.title: Demara

cards.flavor: Do you believe in faeries?
cards.text: 0[credit]: Break sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. When an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Faerie to break a subroutine ends, trash Faerie.
cards.title: Faerie

cards.text: 1[credit]: Break sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install Femme Fatale, choose an installed piece of ice. When you encounter that ice, you may pay 1[credit] per subroutine on that ice to bypass it.
cards.title: Femme Fatale

cards.flavor: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru
cards.text: [click]: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on HQ.
cards.title: Sneakdoor Beta

cards.flavor: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
cards.text:
When you install Atman, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on Atman.
Atman has +1 strength for each power counter on it.
1[credit]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has strength equal to Atman's strength.
cards.title: Atman

cards.flavor: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
cards.text: 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
cards.title: Battering Ram

cards.flavor: Didn't see that coming.
cards.text: [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.
cards.title: Deus X

cards.flavor: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.
cards.text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
cards.title: Gordian Blade

cards.text:
1[credit]: Break ice subroutine.
1[credit]: +1 strength.
[click]: Place 1 virus counter on Crypsis.
When an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Crypsis to break a subroutine ends, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash Crypsis.
cards.title: Crypsis

cards.flavor: With each passing day alone, Hoshiko found it harder to think. With each hour, the static grew louder.
cards.text:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed resource.
Gain 7[credit].
cards.title: Isolation

cards.flavor:
Step 1: Apply to Problem.
Step 2: No more Problem!
cards.text: +1[mu] The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1. The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, gain 1[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
cards.title: Demolisher

cards.flavor: *tap* *tap* *tap*
cards.text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice has -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.
cards.title: Chisel

cards.flavor: "Net space is an abstraction, a white lie protecting fragile comprehensions. Do not limit yourself." -z\h/r
cards.text: [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of accessing cards, reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of the revealed cards. Use this ability only once per turn.
cards.title: Stargate

cards.text: When your turn begins, remove this resource from the game. Choose a server protected by ice. The Corp may trash a piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, the first time this turn you access cards from either R&D or HQ, access 2 additional cards from that server.
cards.title: Climactic Showdown

cards.flavor: Friends break your walls.
cards.text:
When your turn begins or you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
Whenever you make a successful run, you may spend hosted credits for the remainder of that run.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must pay 1[credit] or trash this resource.
cards.title: Fencer Fueno

cards.flavor: "...well, I'm laughing."
cards.text: The first time each turn you install a virus program, place 2 virus counters on this resource. When your turn begins, you may remove any 2 virus counters from your installed cards. If you do, draw 2 cards unless the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
cards.title: The Nihilist

cards.flavor: Friends hide your fears.
cards.text:
When your turn begins or you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
Spend hosted credits to use programs during runs.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must take 1 tag or trash this resource.
cards.title: Trickster Taka

cards.flavor: Blue flames burn the hottest!
cards.text: Look at the top 2 cards of your stack. You may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Draw 2 cards.
cards.title: Blueberry!™ Diesel

cards.flavor: "Do the job. Get paid. Leave feelings at the door." -"Baklan" Bochkin
cards.text: 1[credit]: Break sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. The first time each turn that you break all subroutines on a piece of ice you are encountering using only this program, gain 2[credit].
cards.title: Bukhgalter

cards.flavor: "...but I am without compare."
cards.text:
When the turn during which you installed this resource ends, draw 4 cards.
Immediately before you draw for the first time each turn, look at the top X cards of your stack. Add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. X is equal to the number of cards you will draw plus 1.
cards.title: The Class Act

cards.flavor: Do you know how many food deliveries I've missed this week?
cards.text:
Play only as your first [click].
Whenever you install a card with a printed install cost of 1 or greater this turn, draw 1 card or gain 1[credit].
cards.title: In the Groove

cards.text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of accessing cards, choose a number greater than 0. For each installed card you have with a printed install cost matching that number, reveal 1 card from the top of R&D (max 6). Access one of the revealed cards, then the Corp shuffles R&D. You cannot access any other cards in R&D this run.
cards.title: Khusyuk

cards.flavor: It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not posession, but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
cards.text: When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
cards.title: Gauss

cards.flavor: It makes sysops see red. And orange, yellow, green...
cards.text: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Hosted virus counter: Choose an ice subtype. The ice you are encountering gains that subtype for the remainder of the encounter. Use this ability only once per turn.
cards.title: Pelangi

cards.flavor: "It takes such simple things to sustain us, the most important of which is to be thankful." -Lat
cards.text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
cards.title: Rezeki

cards.flavor: "...then let me paint you a picture."
cards.text:
Use each ability on this resource only once per turn.
[click]: Gain 2[credit].
[click]: Install a program or piece of hardware, paying 1[credit] less.
cards.title: The Artist

cards.flavor: I didn't say your hopper should be hauling garbage. I said it should be hauled away as garbage.
cards.text: Add an installed program or piece of hardware to your grip. If you do, you may install a program or piece of hardware, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the printed install cost of the uninstalled card.
cards.title: Rejig
